privacyPolicy.intro: At WITM, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our app.

personalInfo.label: Personal Information:
personalInfo.text: We may collect information such as your name, email address, and profile picture during account creation or when you update your profile. This helps us uniquely identify you and provide a personalized experience.

usageData.label: App Usage Data:
usageData.text: This includes information about how you interact with the app, such as gameplay statistics, voting activity, challenges completed, leaderboard rankings, and other in-app interactions. We may also collect logs of app crashes or performance data to improve functionality.

deviceInfo.label: Device Information:
deviceInfo.text: We may gather details such as your device type, operating system, app version, and unique device identifiers to ensure compatibility and improve app performance.

locationData.label: Location Data:
locationData.text: If you grant permission, we may collect location information to enhance app features, such as localized challenges or friend recommendations. This data is optional and controlled by your device settings.

howUsed.title: How We Use Your Information
howUsed.item1: To provide, maintain, and improve the app experience by understanding user behavior and optimizing app performance.
howUsed.item2: To personalize content and features, such as tailoring challenges or voting options to your preferences and interactions.
howUsed.item3: To communicate with you about updates, special offers, or important information related to the app.
howUsed.item4: To ensure app security and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized activities.
howUsed.item5: To analyze app usage trends and generate insights that help us improve our services.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and do not sell your data to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.item1: With trusted service providers who assist us in maintaining and improving the app, such as hosting services, analytics platforms, or customer support tools.
dataSharing.item2: When required by law or to comply with legal processes, such as responding to valid court orders or regulatory inquiries.
dataSharing.item3: To protect the rights, property, or safety of our users, our company, or the public when there is reasonable belief of harm or fraudulent activity.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: We respect your rights to access, manage, and control your personal information. You can:
rights.item1: Access and update your personal details directly within the app settings.
rights.item2: Request data deletion or account deactivation by contacting our support team.
rights.item3: Revoke permissions such as location access or notifications through your device settings.
rights.retention: We may retain certain data as required by law or for legitimate business purposes, such as resolving disputes or maintaining security records.

security.title: Security Measures
security.text: We implement robust security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or loss. These include encryption, secure servers, and periodic security audits. However, no method of electronic transmission or storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

changes.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Significant updates will be communicated through the app or via email, and the updated policy will always be available on our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please feel free to contact us:
contact.closing: We are committed to addressing your concerns promptly and transparently.

terms.intro: Welcome to WITM! By using our app, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. Please read these terms carefully before accessing or using our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By creating an account or using our app, you accept these terms and conditions in full. If you do not agree to these terms, you must not use our app.

responsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.item1: You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information during account registration and maintain the security of your account credentials.
responsibilities.item2: You are responsible for all activities conducted under your account and agree not to engage in any behavior that is unlawful, harmful, or violates our policies.

ip.title: 3. Intellectual Property
ip.text: All content, features, and functionality of the app, including text, images, videos, graphics, and trademarks, are owned by WITM or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without prior written consent.

liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: WITM is not responsible for any damages arising from the use of the app, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Use the app at your own risk.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms or engage in any unauthorized activities. We may also terminate services without prior notice if required for legal or operational reasons.

governingLaw.title: 6. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Switzerland. Any disputes arising out of or related to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Fribourg, Switzerland.

changes.title: 7. Changes to the Terms
changes.text: We may update these terms from time to time to reflect changes in our policies or legal requirements. You will be notified of significant updates, and the updated terms will be effective immediately upon posting.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, feel free to reach out to us:

deleteAccount.intro: Deleting your account is a permanent and irreversible action. By proceeding with account deletion, you agree to the following
deleteAccount.permanentTitle: Your account will be deleted permanently

permanentItems.item1: All your personal data, including account information, transaction history, communication logs, preferences, and saved content, will be permanently erased from our systems.
permanentItems.item2: You will lose access to any features or services associated with your account, and this cannot be restored under any circumstances.
permanentItems.item3: Any active subscriptions or ongoing transactions will be automatically canceled, and no further access will be provided.

deleteAccount.instructionsTitle: Important Instructions Before Deleting Your Account
deleteAccount.instructionsIntro: To avoid losing important information, we recommend the following steps before proceeding:

instructionsItems.item1: Download and save a copy of any important data, such as transaction history or personal files associated with your account.
instructionsItems.item2: Ensure all ongoing transactions are completed and resolved. Once deleted, you will not be able to access related details.
instructionsItems.item3: Cancel any active subscriptions to avoid future charges.

deleteAccount.howToText: You can delete your account by navigating to the account settings page and selecting the "Delete Account" option. Alternatively, you can request account deletion by contacting our support team at
deleteAccount.confirmationText: By confirming account deletion, you acknowledge and accept that all associated data will be permanently removed, and this action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.cardDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account and all associated data? This action cannot be undone.
